name: Game of Thrones, death by season and episode

data.name: Will
data.role: Ranger of the Night’s Watch
data.execution: Beheaded for desertion by Ned Stark

data.name: Jon Arryn
data.role: Hand to the King before Ned Stark
data.execution: Poisoned by Lysa Arryn and Littlefinger

data.name: Jory Cassel
data.role: Captain of the guards to House Stark
data.execution: Stabbed by Jaime Lannister through the eye

data.name: Viserys Targaryen
data.role: Exiled head of House Targaryen and brother to Daenerys Targaryen
data.execution: Khal Drogo pours molten gold on his head at Daenerys’ command

data.name: Benjen Stark
data.role: First Ranger of the Night’s Watch, Brother of Ned Stark
data.execution: Unknown

data.name: Robert Baratheon
data.role: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms
data.execution: Mortally wounded by a wild boar after drinking wine given to him by Lancel Lannister at Cersei Lannister’s command

data.name: Syrio Forel
data.role: Master sword fighter and Arya Stark’s instructor in combat
data.execution: Presumably killed by Ser Meryn in a sword fight (he was only armed with a training sword)

data.name: Eddard Stark
data.role: Hand of the King and Lord of the North
data.execution: Beheaded by Ser Ilyn Payne at the order of Joffrey Baratheon

data.name: Drogo
data.role: Chieftain of the Dothraki people and husband of Daenerys Targaryen
data.execution: Smothered by Daenerys Targaryen in a mercy killing after a spell by Mirri Maz Duur leaves him in a catatonic state

data.name: Rhaego
data.role: Son of Khal Drogo and Khaleesi Daenerys Targaryen
data.execution: Stillborn because of a blood magic ritual performed by Mirri Maz Duur

data.name: Mirri Maz Duur
data.role: Enslaved godswife
data.execution: Burned alive on Drogo’s funeral pyre by Daenerys Targaryen

data.name: Rakharo
data.role: Dothraki bodyguard to Daenerys Targaryen
data.execution: Killed and decapitated by a rival khalasar while scouting the Red Waste

data.name: Yoren
data.role: Recruiter for the Night’s Watch
data.execution: Killed by Ser Amory Lorch, loyal to House Lannister, in a fight

data.name: Renly Baratheon
data.role: Master of Laws, Claimant to the Iron Throne, brother of Robert and Stannis Baratheon
data.execution: Killed by a shadow with Stannis Baratheon’s face that was birthed by Melisandre

data.name: Rodrik Cassel
data.role: Master-at-Arms at Winterfell, Servant of House Stark
data.execution: Decapitated by Theon Greyjoy

data.name: Irri
data.role: Dothraki handmaiden to Daenerys Targaryen
data.execution: Murdered during Xaro Xhoan Daxos’ theft of the dragons at Qarth

data.name: Maester Luwin
data.role: Maester of Winterfell
data.execution: Osha ends his suffering after he is stabbed with a spear by ironborn raider Dagmer

data.name: Qhorin
data.role: Night’s Watch ranger
data.execution: Killed by Jon Snow (at Qhorin’s own behest) in order to trick the Wildlings into thinking Jon has left the Night’s Watch

data.name: Pyat Pree
data.role: Warlock from Qarth, Member of the Thirteen
data.execution: Burned alive by Daenerys Targaryen’s dragons

data.name: Doreah
data.role: Handmaiden to Daenerys Targaryen
data.execution: Locked with Xaro Xhoan Daxos inside a Valyrian stone vault by Jorah Mormont at the order of Daenerys Targaryen

data.name: Xaro Xhoan Daxos
data.role: Merchant in Qarth
data.execution: Locked in a Valyrian stone vault by Jorah Mormont on the orders of Daenerys Targaryen

data.name: Hoster Tully
data.role: Lord of Riverrun, Father of Edmure Tully, Catelyn Stark and Lysa Arryn
data.execution: Illness

data.name: Jeor Mormont
data.role: Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch
data.execution: Stabbed to death by Night’s Watchman Rast during a mutiny

data.name: Craster
data.role: A Wildling who lived with his daughter-wives beyond the Wall
data.execution: Killed by Karl Tanner, a Night’s Watchman

data.name: Kraznys
data.role: Salve-trader in Slaver’s Bay and one of the Good Masters
data.execution: Burned alive by Drogon after he tries to trade the Unsullied for the dragon and insults Daenerys

data.name: Beric Dondarrion
data.role: Leader of Brotherhood Without Banners
data.execution: Killed by the Hound in trial by combat

data.name: Ros
data.role: Prostitute in Littlefinger’s brothel and spy for Varys
data.execution: Shot by Joffrey Baratheon with a crossbow

data.name: Talisa Stark
data.role: Wife of Robb Stark
data.execution: Stabbed in the stomach while pregnant by Lothar Frey at the Red Wedding
